Package uicontrollers.admin

Class EventsController

java.lang.Object
uicontrollers.admin.EventsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class EventsController extends Object implements Controller
This class serves as a controller for the event section of administrator dashboard.css. It is mainly used to control the operations carried out related to events (such as creation, modification, publishing results...).
